verbose_text: The activation of the phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase (PI3K) signaling pathway, including protein kinase B (Akt) and endothelial nitric oxide synthase (eNOS) phosphorylation promote the synthesis of nitric oxide (NO), which is considered to be involved in the protection of endothelial function.
evidence: nitric oxide synthase (eNOS) phosphorylation promote the synthesis of nitric oxide
